publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Text begins: This day the board did take into consideration the complaints made from seuerall parts of the kingdome, ...
Limiting the use of farthing tokens, with extract of Star Chamber decree of 25 Apr. 1634 forbidding their payment as wages, etc.---STC.
Arms 24; Steele notation: complaints Starre- 2) as and.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
